text: Hidden gem! One of the best chicken chop I had! Will bring family over soon. Thank you for choosing quality chicken. The pepper sauce brings out the flavour of the fresh chicken. The skin with the right amount of fats. Thank you for your effort boss. See you guys soon üëçüèº

One of the best Western Food stalls in Toa Payoh Lorong 1. Serving some really good, crispy and hot fried spring chicken.
It beats the nearby KFC restaurant around the corner as each piece of chicken are freshly fried upon order. Lady who take your order are always full of smile and courteous.

Very bad customer service. Food not bad but the staffs there are very rude just one particular staff the other one was ok. The staff was racist as he talk fine with the people with the same race as the staff and rude to other race people and can‚Äôt take order properly and blame the customer.

One of the best western food stall at toa payoh. Boss and staff very friendly.
Value For Money
